metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12400 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: When converting coordinates from projective to affine, the modular inversion was not performed in constant time, resulting in a possible timing-based side channel attack. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 80 and Firefox for Android < 80.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
nss: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
